fields.title: What we collect
fields.content: We may collect information you provide directly (such as name, email, profile details, and messages), payment and billing details, and usage data including pages visited, actions taken, and device/browser information.

fields.title: How we use your data
fields.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process payments, deliver customer support, send transactional emails, and maintain security. Marketing emails are only sent if you explicitly opt in.

fields.title: Cookies and tracking
fields.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to remember preferences, analyze traffic, and personalize your experience. Third-party providers (analytics, payments) may also place cookies.

fields.title: Sharing & Third parties
fields.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share limited information with trusted providers (payments, analytics, email) or when required by law. Only the minimum necessary data is shared.

fields.title: Your rights
fields.content: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data. You may also opt out of marketing communications at any time. Contact us to exercise these rights.

fields.title: Data retention
fields.content: We retain personal data only as long as necessary to provide services, comply with legal obligations, or resolve disputes. After this period, data is anonymized or securely deleted.

fields.title: Security
fields.content: We implement industry-standard security practices to protect your data. However, no system is fully secure. Please notify us immediately at folderfixteam@gmail.com if you suspect unauthorized access.

fields.title: Contact
fields.content: If you have any privacy-related questions or requests, please email us at folderfixteam@gmail.com.
